May 3-14 status

Tags: mozilla, webdev, weekly updates
19 May 2010

Two weeks ago (May 3-7)

  • pushed 2.0/1.5.4 with rest of SUMOdev

    • first time had problems with nfs mounts
    • second time was a success, yay!

  • r?d nicer 404/500 handlers

  • r?d new wsgi script

  • r?d rewrite for discussion forums, which also cleaned up some of the search rewrites from previous push

  • r?d posting should update # of replies

  • threads list view

Last week (May 10-14)

  • r?d preliminary work on atom feeds
  • forums list view
  • wiki markup in discussion forums
  • filed some new bugs
  • added some omitted indexes to tiki
  • re-sync db, to test the SQL fix from above, also had IT run schematic and set up test forum
  • remove omniture tags from tiki
  • fix crc32 not working with unicode
  • discussion with Dave Dash about ACL on AMO

This week (May 17-21)

  • implement ACL after serious research
  • activate admin in forums app
  • help out new team members
  • fix up some of the wiki parser bugs

I am the Co-founder and CTO of SoWink Inc., a revolutionary social online-dating service. Be sure to check out our blog for more about us.

Until April 2011, I worked as a web developer for Mozilla, with main focus on Django, Python, and PHP. Occasionally, I write tutorials or post other information I find interesting.

I enjoy doing freelance work for other websites, mostly non-profits. If you're interested in my services, contact me through one of the links below.

Follow me -- Email me -- My GitHub

Success is a journey, not a destination. The doing is often more important than the outcome. — Arthur Robert Ashe, Jr
